author: ajaquith
msg: The sort-of-secret "share container user accounts with JDBCUserDatabase" option has been permanently removed, and will not be replaced. This was previously added to make it easier for users to add themselves to JDBC-based container realms. However, the switch to salted passwords precludes the continued use of this option. So it's gone and won't come back.

author: ajaquith
msg: Passwords are now salted and hashed per RFC 2307. Every password is salted with a 8-byte random salt.
